name: Llama Rama
description:
Llama Rama, the new 2d endlessrunner game is out! 

Check it out now! Llama Rama is a 2d endless runner set in the Peruvian landscape. The goal is to travel through Peru as far as possible without dying. Do you have what it takes to dodge all obstacles? Make sure to not pick up too much items or the llama will get too fluffy to walk! During your travels you will find the Machu Picchu, dry savannas and deep forests. Features: - Beautiful and colorful graphics - Different Levels - The llama getting fluffier - Dodging obstacles - Endless gameplay 

Play it now!
